description: Returns query execution runtime statistics related to a single execution of a query if you have access to the workgroup in which the query ran. Statistics from the Timeline section of the response object are available as soon as  QueryExecutionStatus$State is in a SUCCEEDED or FAILED state. The remaining non-timeline statistics in the response (like stage-level input and output row count and data size) are updated asynchronously and may not be available immediately after a query completes. The non-timeline statistics are also not included when a query has row-level filters defined in Lake Formation.

parameters.name: QueryExecutionId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the query execution.

nested_items.name: QueryRuntimeStatistics
nested_items.description: Runtime statistics about the query execution.

nested_items.name: QueryQueueTimeInMillis
nested_items.description: The number of milliseconds that the query was in your query queue waiting for resources. Note that if transient errors occur, Athena might automatically add the query back to the queue.

nested_items.name: ServicePreProcessingTimeInMillis
nested_items.description: The number of milliseconds that Athena spends on preprocessing before it submits the query to the engine.

nested_items.name: QueryPlanningTimeInMillis
nested_items.description: The number of milliseconds that Athena took to plan the query processing flow. This includes the time spent retrieving table partitions from the data source. Note that because the query engine performs the query planning, query planning time is a subset of engine processing time.

nested_items.name: EngineExecutionTimeInMillis
nested_items.description: The number of milliseconds that the query took to execute.

nested_items.name: ServiceProcessingTimeInMillis
nested_items.description: The number of milliseconds that Athena took to finalize and publish the query results after the query engine finished running the query.

nested_items.name: TotalExecutionTimeInMillis
nested_items.description: The number of milliseconds that Athena took to run the query.

nested_items.name: InputRows
nested_items.description: The number of rows read to execute the query.

nested_items.name: InputBytes
nested_items.description: The number of bytes read to execute the query.

nested_items.name: OutputBytes
nested_items.description: The number of bytes returned by the query.

nested_items.name: OutputRows
nested_items.description: The number of rows returned by the query.

nested_items.name: OutputStage
nested_items.description: Stage statistics such as input and output rows and bytes, execution time, and stage state. This information also includes substages and the query stage plan.

nested_items.name: StageId
nested_items.description: The identifier for a stage.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: State of the stage after query execution.

nested_items.name: OutputBytes
nested_items.description: The number of bytes output from the stage after execution.

nested_items.name: OutputRows
nested_items.description: The number of rows output from the stage after execution.

nested_items.name: InputBytes
nested_items.description: The number of bytes input into the stage for execution.

nested_items.name: InputRows
nested_items.description: The number of rows input into the stage for execution.

nested_items.name: ExecutionTime
nested_items.description: Time taken to execute this stage.

nested_items.name: QueryStagePlan
nested_items.description: Stage plan information such as name, identifier, sub plans, and source stages.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of the query stage plan that describes the operation this stage is performing as part of query execution.

nested_items.name: Identifier
nested_items.description: Information about the operation this query stage plan node is performing.

nested_items.name: Children
nested_items.description: Stage plan information such as name, identifier, sub plans, and remote sources of child plan nodes/

nested_items.name: RemoteSources
nested_items.description: Source plan node IDs.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SubStages
nested_items.description: List of sub query stages that form this stage execution plan.
